_header: Upon the thing that is lost pity and compassion
_description: A verse tag in a collection of sermons by John Waldeby — three monorhyming lines

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
Vp on þe thynge þat is lost pyte & compassiunffor
                    þe thynge þat is lost wo & weymentaciunAnde to þe thynge
                    þat is lost kyndely inclinaciun
